name: subsecretary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who works for and is slightly lower in rank than the secretary (= the person in charge) of a government department in some countries: She was a subsecretary in the Ecuadorian Ministry of Energy and Mines. The Mexican sub-secretary of finance explained the government’s policy goal. Synonym
undersecretary
More examplesFewer examplesthe Subsecretary of National Defence for the Mexican armyHe advised various officials in Argentina from the President down to the Sub-secretary of Foreign Affairs.The sub-secretary made all the arrangements for the trip.
